statements: SELECT * FROM past_concerts WHERE concert_id = 1;
SELECT concert_id, concert_date FROM past_concerts WHERE attendance > 1000 ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM past_concerts WHERE concert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT setlist, reviews FROM past_concerts WHERE attendance < 5000;
SELECT concert_id, attendance FROM past_concerts ORDER BY attendance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM past_concerts WHERE attendance > 100 ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT concert_id, setlist FROM past_concerts WHERE reviews IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT concert_date, attendance FROM past_concerts WHERE attendance BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM past_concerts WHERE setlist LIKE '%rock%' ORDER BY concert_date ASC, attendance DESC;
SELECT concert_id, attendance, reviews FROM past_concerts WHERE reviews LIKE '%positive%' AND attendance > 50 ORDER BY attendance DESC, concert_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM concert_setlist;
SELECT concert_id, setlist FROM concert_setlist ORDER BY setlist DESC;
SELECT concert_id, attendance FROM concert_details WHERE attendance > 1000;
SELECT concert_id, review FROM concert_details WHERE review LIKE '%awesome%';
SELECT concert_id, setlist FROM concert_setlist WHERE concert_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM concert_setlist WHERE concert_id = 1;
SELECT setlist FROM concert_setlist WHERE concert_id = 2;
SELECT concert_id, attendance FROM concert_details WHERE attendance > 100;
SELECT * FROM concert_details WHERE review LIKE '%amazing%';
SELECT * FROM concert_setlist JOIN concert_details ON concert_setlist.concert_id = concert_details.concert_id;
SELECT * FROM Setlist
SELECT song_name, song_order FROM Setlist ORDER BY song_order DESC
SELECT concert_id, song_name FROM Setlist WHERE song_order = 3
SELECT attendee_name, attendance_status FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Attended'
SELECT concert_id, reviewer_name, rating FROM Review WHERE rating >= 4
SELECT * FROM Setlist ORDER BY concert_id ASC, song_order DESC;
SELECT song_name, song_order FROM Setlist WHERE concert_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT concert_id, COUNT(attendee_name) AS total_attendees FROM Attendance GROUP BY concert_id HAVING COUNT(attendee_name) > 5;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, rating FROM Review WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT concert_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Review GROUP BY concert_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM setlists;
SELECT setlist_id, concert_date, songs FROM setlists;
SELECT concert_date, total_attendees FROM attendance ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, rating, comment FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT concert_date, venue, artist FROM concerts WHERE venue = 'Madison Square Garden';
SELECT * FROM setlists WHERE concert_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT artist, venue FROM concerts WHERE concert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY artist ASC;
SELECT setlist_id, songs, concert_date FROM setlists WHERE setlist_id IN (SELECT setlist_id FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4) ORDER BY concert_date ASC;
SELECT artist, COUNT(concert_id) AS total_concerts FROM concerts GROUP BY artist HAVING total_concerts > 5 ORDER BY total_concerts DESC;
SELECT artist, venue, total_attendees FROM concerts JOIN attendance ON concerts.concert_date = attendance.concert_date WHERE attendance.total_attendees >= 1000 ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;
SELECT * FROM Concerts ORDER BY concert_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT artist_name, venue_name, concert_date FROM Concerts WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Setlists WHERE song_duration > INTERVAL '3 minutes';
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, review_text FROM Reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT venue_name, city, capacity FROM Venues WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Concerts;
SELECT artist_name, venue_name, concert_date FROM Concerts WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name, venue_name FROM Concerts WHERE venue_name LIKE '%Hall%' ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT c.artist_name, v.city, a.attendee_name FROM Concerts c JOIN Venues v ON c.venue_name = v.venue_name JOIN Attendance a ON c.concert_id = a.concert_id WHERE v.city = 'New York';
SELECT c.artist_name, r.reviewer_name, r.rating, r.review_text FROM Concerts c JOIN Reviews r ON c.concert_id = r.concert_id WHERE r.rating >= 4 ORDER BY r.rating DESC, c.artist_name ASC;
